segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on drying that plate, nothing else seems to matter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she's completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, standing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so calm, it's like a different world compared to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's determination to get those cookies is almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be encouraging the boy, not realizing the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spreading across the floor, and she's still drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR
